attributes.action: Create Safe Haven places for unwanted babies and young children at hospitals etc
attributes.additional_details: This will help prevent deaths in newborn babies but will help many mothers who are in shock or panic in that moment without judgement or legal repercussions
attributes.background: Create a safe haven for parents who do not want their newborn babies like they have in the USA

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701043
